title: The Geothermal Energy Part Of “Unleashing American Energy” Is Beginning To Pay Off
description:
The US geothermal industry is gearing up to move into new territory, helping to get fossil fuels out of the power generation business.

The post The Geothermal Energy Part Of “Unleashing American Energy” Is Beginning To Pay Off appeared first on CleanTechnica.
